places.name: Historic Downtown Square
places.description: Experience the charm of our historic downtown area with boutique shops, local restaurants, and beautiful architecture dating back to the early 1900s. The square hosts regular community events and farmers markets throughout the year.

places.name: Riverside Park
places.description: This beautiful 40-acre park offers walking trails, picnic areas, playgrounds, and scenic views of the river. Perfect for family outings, morning jogs, or peaceful afternoon strolls. The park also features a boat launch and fishing pier.

places.name: Cultural Arts Center
places.description: Our state-of-the-art Cultural Arts Center showcases local talent through art exhibitions, theatrical performances, and music concerts. The center also offers classes and workshops for all ages in various artistic disciplines.

places.name: Oakwood Winery
places.description: Nestled in the rolling hills just outside town, Oakwood Winery produces award-winning wines using locally grown grapes. Visit for tastings, tours of the vineyard and production facilities, and seasonal harvest events.

places.name: Heritage Museum
places.description: Discover the rich history of our region through interactive exhibits, historical artifacts, and engaging storytelling. The museum preserves our community's heritage and offers educational programs for schools and visitors alike.

places.name: Sunset Golf Club
places.description: Enjoy a round of golf on our beautifully maintained 18-hole championship course with stunning views of the surrounding landscape. The club features a pro shop, driving range, and restaurant open to both members and the public.

places.name: Lakeside Dining District
places.address: 500-600 Lake Shore Drive, City, State ZIP
places.description: Experience waterfront dining at its finest with a variety of restaurants offering fresh seafood, international cuisine, and farm-to-table specialties. Enjoy your meal with breathtaking views of the lake from indoor or outdoor seating.

places.name: Mountain Trail Wilderness
places.description: Explore over 25 miles of hiking trails through pristine wilderness with varying difficulty levels. The area features spectacular viewpoints, diverse wildlife, and seasonal wildflower displays. Guided hikes are available through the visitor center.
